name: BladeShield
description: Survive wave after wave of enemy AI bots in this intergalactic VR game. Switch between shield and blade with the click of a button, charge up your light blade by blocking incoming laser bolts, and unleash a powerful EMP blast!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 970 Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel i7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 1070 Storage: 600 MB available space
